p: The Calu-3 (ATCC No. HTB-55) cell line was purchased from American Type Culture Collection (Manassas, VA, USA) at passage 19. Cells were grown in humidified atmosphere of 5% CO 2–95% air at 37 °C. Cell culture medium was comprised of DMEM/F-12 (1:1), 15% FBS, 2.40 mg/L NaHCO 3, 100 U/L penicillin, 100 mg/L streptomycin, 0.5 mM sodium pyruvate, 0.5 mM non-essential amino acids, and 1 mMGlutamax. All cultures had media replaced thrice weekly.
